recipesJson.name: Christmas Cupcake
recipesJson.author: XxBulldogIrishxX
recipesJson.description: A sweet vibrant vanilla cupcake body with a cool peppermint icing and flakes at first taste...I added light menthol to it to give it a little coolness for the peppermint but not over the top cold...Also I personally used (LB) Menthol instead of TPA but figured way more people have TPA and I doubt it makes much of a difference at such a low percentage. Also I personally used about 6 drops of (Flv) Cool Menthol which not everyone has in their arsenal but it really made it better for me but was great before it too.. Merry Christmas ya filthy animals!
